metadata.Title: CVE-2022-23824 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: IBPB may not prevent return branch predictions from being specified by pre-IBPB branch targets leading to a potential information disclosure.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> hypervisor packages are in universe. For issues in the hypervisor, add appropriate tags to each section, ex: Tags_xen: universe-binary

criterions.comment: xen package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
